author: gtrintinalia
content: Hi there, could someone with access to fusaka-testnet-announcement (https://blog.ethereum.org/2025/09/26/fusaka-testnet-announcement) please update the Besu version from 25.9.0 to 25.10.0-RC2 https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/releases/tag/25.10.0-RC2  Both versions work for the Fusaka testnets, but the newer one includes the jc-kzg dependency update.
